name: Calx's Arts
description: Shift 1 Energy from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.
descriptionraw: Shift 1 $[K310] from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.
descriptionreplaced: Shift 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color> from at most 2 of your characters on standby to your active character.
storytext: "Not to worry. The experiment has been completed, and it is — if I may say so — a great success."
